review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick due to online reviews.  But for me, I am compelled to give it a 2 star rating because I could never get it to reliably connect to my wi-fi router.  The user interface seems good, but without being able to connect to program content, I couldn't do a proper evaluation.  It would only connect when I was no more than 10 feet from my router and that is not acceptable.  My Roku boxes all work fine everywhere in my house.
author: JerryS

review: We lost our Roku in a move and this was a great replacement! So user-friendly.  I love that you just plug in the stick and can use it with any smart tv! We plan to use it for our play room for cartoons and avoid paying another cable fee! Thanks Amazon!
author: NapaMommy

review: This is my favorite purchase of the year. I was so excited to get rid of my cable and just use Netflix streaming and Hulu. Having a prime membership and being able to watch some stuff for free, ended up being an even bigger bonus. Add in the music for when I'm cleaning and the games my kids can play..LOVE it!
